statements: SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum;
SELECT lesson_title, lesson_description FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE lesson_plan_id = 2;
SELECT lesson_title, suggested_activities FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE id = 5;
SELECT lesson_title, lesson_description, materials_needed FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE lesson_objective LIKE '%creative%' ORDER BY lesson_title;
SELECT lesson_title, suggested_activities FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE materials_needed IS NOT NULL AND lesson_plan_id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum
SELECT lesson_title, lesson_description FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE lesson_plan_id = 1
SELECT lesson_title, lesson_objectives FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE id < 5 AND lesson_plan_id > 2
SELECT lesson_title, materials_needed FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE lesson_objectives LIKE '%problem-solving%'
SELECT id, lesson_title, suggested_activities FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE lesson_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM curriculum;
SELECT lesson_name, objective FROM lesson_plans WHERE curriculum_id = '1';
SELECT curriculum_name, age_range FROM curriculum WHERE age_range = '3-5';
SELECT lesson_name, curriculum_name FROM lesson_plans JOIN curriculum ON lesson_plans.curriculum_id = curriculum.curriculum_id;
SELECT * FROM lesson_plans ORDER BY lesson_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM curriculum WHERE curriculum_name = 'Math' ORDER BY age_range DESC;
SELECT lesson_name, objective FROM lesson_plans WHERE curriculum_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o' ORDER BY lesson_name ASC;
SELECT curriculum_name, age_range FROM curriculum WHERE age_range LIKE '%-5%' ORDER BY age_range ASC;
SELECT lesson_plan_id, lesson_name FROM lesson_plans WHERE objective IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lesson_name DESC, lesson_plan_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM curriculum JOIN lesson_plans ON curriculum.curriculum_id = lesson_plans.curriculum_id WHERE curriculum.age_range = '6-8 years' AND lesson_plans.objective LIKE '%critical thinking%';
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum;
SELECT curriculum_id, curriculum_name, age_group FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE age_group='Preschool';
SELECT lesson_title, duration_hours FROM lesson_plans WHERE duration_hours > 1 ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;

SELECT curriculum_name, count(curriculum_id) AS total_lesson_plans FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum JOIN lesson_plans ON early_childhood_education_curriculum.curriculum_id = lesson_plans.curriculum_id GROUP BY curriculum_name;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM curriculum_activities ORDER BY activity_type ASC, activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE age_group = 'Infants'
SELECT lesson_title, duration_hours FROM lesson_plans ORDER BY duration_hours DESC
SELECT curriculum_name, learning_domain FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE curriculum_id > 3
SELECT * FROM curriculum_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Art' AND activity_description LIKE '%creativity%'
SELECT * FROM lesson_plans WHERE materials_needed IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM curriculum;
SELECT curriculum_name, age_group FROM curriculum WHERE curriculum_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lesson_plan ORDER BY lesson_duration DESC;
SELECT objective_description FROM learning_objective WHERE lesson_id = 3;
SELECT lesson_name, curriculum_name FROM lesson_plan JOIN curriculum ON lesson_plan.curriculum_id = curriculum.curriculum_id;
SELECT * FROM curriculum;
SELECT curriculum_name, age_group FROM curriculum WHERE age_group = 'Primary';
SELECT curriculum_name, COUNT(*) AS total_lessons FROM curriculum c JOIN lesson_plan l ON c.curriculum_id = l.curriculum_id GROUP BY curriculum_name;

SELECT l.lesson_name, lo.objective_description, a.assessment_type FROM lesson_plan l JOIN learning_objective lo ON l.lesson_id = lo.lesson_id JOIN assessment a ON lo.objective_id = a.objective_id WHERE l.lesson_duration > 60;
SELECT curriculum_name, AVG(lesson_duration) AS average_duration FROM curriculum c JOIN lesson_plan l ON c.curriculum_id = l.curriculum_id GROUP BY curriculum_name HAVING AVG(lesson_duration) > 45;
SELECT * FROM curriculum;
SELECT name, description FROM curriculum WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lesson_plans WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT title, topics FROM lesson_plans WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name, type FROM activities WHERE type = 'Group';
SELECT * FROM curriculum ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, title, topics FROM lesson_plans WHERE duration >= 60;
SELECT name, type, link FROM resources WHERE type = 'video' ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, title, description FROM assessments WHERE due_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT id, name, type FROM resources WHERE link IS NOT NULL AND type = 'pdf';
